title: How can technology improve patient care? - Quora

response.answer_text: Over the years, the healthcare industry is witnessing a complete transformation with mobility or use of mobile technology. The importance of mobile devices is no more restricted to our personal lives, in fact, major industry verticals such as in healthcare it is a growing need and provides huge benefits to improve patient care.  Mobility or Mobile technologies in healthcare- The healthcare industry is transforming fast and mobile technologies are leveraging its digital transformation, allowing the healthcare organizations to empower healthcare staff with the innovative and latest mobile technologies. Mobility provides some significant benefits like Improved efficiency and productivityPrompt patient careSaves timeBetter collaboration with patientsSimplifies remote work or frontline tasksHowever, with the introduction to mobile devices and technologies in healthcare has many challenges like device misuse or healthcare data security risks. Cloud technologies like mobile device management software for healthcare are important tools which help organizations to centrally manage and secure deployed healthcare IT assets as well as data and information in it. mHealth or mobile health is on the rise and healthcare organizations are implementing mHealth strategies throughout to improve patient care and provide more improved services.
